analyzed: 'di la de dang 'dra ba'i ngo bo yod pas 'di ni de dang 'dra ba'i ngo bo can no ;
translated: This has the nature of being like that, so it has the nature of being like that.

original: / de'i ngo bo ni de dang 'dra ba'i ngo bo can nyid do //
analyzed: / de'i ngo bo ni de dang 'dra ba'i ngo bo can nyid do //
translated: The nature of that is the nature of being like that.

original: de ltar nang gi dag la rgyu rnams kyi nye bar sbyor ba'i yul tha dad par bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar nang gi dag la rgyu rnams kyi nye bar sbyor ba'i yul tha dad par bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the difference in objects of application of the causes of internal things,

original: mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to summarize,

original: dngos su 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dngos su 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúAlthough the effect is not actually different,‚Äù and so on.

original: dngos su 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin mod kyi @129a * //
analyzed: dngos su 'bras bu tha dad pa ma yin mod kyi @129a * //
translated: Although the effect is not actually different,

original: 'on kyang rgyu'i ngo bo nyid tha dad pa las /
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu'i ngo bo nyid tha dad pa las /
translated: nevertheless, from the difference in the nature of the cause,

original: 'bras bu'i khyad par tha dad pa kho na dag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i khyad par tha dad pa kho na dag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: the difference in the effect is just different.

original: de'i phyir rgyu tha dad pa yin yang des bya ba'i khyad par tha mi dad pa ma yin pas 'bras bu rgyu'i rjes su byed pa nyid grub bo //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu tha dad pa yin yang des bya ba'i khyad par tha mi dad pa ma yin pas 'bras bu rgyu'i rjes su byed pa nyid grub bo //
translated: Therefore, although the causes are different, the specific activity that they perform is not different. Thus, the establishment of the effect as a mere subsequent state of the cause is proven.

original: de dag gi bya ba ni des bya ba ste /
analyzed: de dag gi bya ba ni des bya ba ste /
translated: The activity of those is the activity of that.

original: 'di ni des bya ba yang yin la khyad par yang yin pas de'i bya ba'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: 'di ni des bya ba yang yin la khyad par yang yin pas de'i bya ba'i khyad par ro //
translated: That is the activity of that and it is a specific activity, thus it is the specific activity of that.

original: de 'bras bu rnams rgyu'i rjes su byed pa nyid du bstan nas /
analyzed: de 'bras bu rnams rgyu'i rjes su byed pa nyid du bstan nas /
translated: Having taught that the effects are a mere subsequent state of the cause,

original: rgyu la rag las pa'i 'bras bu rnams rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu la rag las pa'i 'bras bu rnams rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the presentation of effects that are dependent on causes,

original: rgyu'i nus pa tha dad pa de dag kho na zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rgyu'i nus pa tha dad pa de dag kho na zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: he says, ‚Äújust those different potencies of the causes.‚Äù

original: rgyu'i nus pa tha dad pa bshad ma thag pa gang dag yin pa de dag kho nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rgyu'i nus pa tha dad pa bshad ma thag pa gang dag yin pa de dag kho nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Just those means just those that were just explained as the different potencies of the causes.

original: rgyu rnams kyi nus pa dag ste /üîΩde dag tha dad pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar te /
analyzed: rgyu rnams kyi nus pa dag ste / de dag tha dad pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar te /
translated: The potencies of the causesüîΩare different from each other.üîΩThe term ‚Äúdifferent‚Äù should be applied to the specific activities.

original: de dag tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par dag la bya'o //
analyzed: de dag tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par dag la bya'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúdifferent‚Äù refers to the specific activities.

original: yang de dag bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang de dag bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says:

original: skad cig pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skad cig pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are momentary,

original: bdag nyid ji ltar ba bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: bdag nyid ji ltar ba bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: they are like what they are.

original: gang gis bdag nyid kyi so so'i khyad par can gyi 'bras bu gang yin pa de gdon mi za bar bskyed par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dag ni zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gang gis bdag nyid kyi so so'i khyad par can gyi 'bras bu gang yin pa de gdon mi za bar bskyed par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dag ni zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Those who strive to produce the effect that is their own particular result, without fail, are called ‚Äúthose who strive to produce their own particular result.‚Äù

original: 'di dag gi nus pa chos pa med pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar te /üîΩchod ba med pa zhes bya ba ni thogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: 'di dag gi nus pa chos pa med pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar te / chod ba med pa zhes bya ba ni thogs pa med pa ste /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúwithout an obstruction to their power‚Äù should be supplied.üîΩ‚Äú Without an obstruction‚Äù means ‚Äúwithout an impediment.‚Äù

original: gdon mi za bar skyed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar skyed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means ‚Äúwithout fail.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir nus pa chod pa med pa dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir nus pa chod pa med pa dag yin zhe na /
translated: Why are they without an obstruction to their power?

original: skad cig ma'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: skad cig ma'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúbecause they are momentary.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir skad cig pa dag yin pa de'i phyir de dag gi nus pa dgag par mi nus so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir skad cig pa dag yin pa de'i phyir de dag gi nus pa dgag par mi nus so //
translated: Because they are momentary, their power cannot be obstructed.

original: de lta bu de dag ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu de dag ci yin zhe na /
translated: What are they like?

original: tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response to that is: ‚ÄúThe effect of the collection, etc.‚Äù

original: de dag ni tshogs pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de'i ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu dag yin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni tshogs pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de'i ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu dag yin zhes bya'o //
translated: Those are said to be the causes of the establishment of the nature of that which is the effect of the collection.

original: de dag ji ltar ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: de dag ji ltar ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu dag yin zhe na /
translated: How are they the causes of the establishment of the nature of that?

original: 'di ltar de ni de mtha' dag las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni de mtha' dag las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In response to that, it is said, ‚ÄúBecause that is produced from all of them, etc.‚ÄùüîΩBecause that is produced from all of them, the nature of that is established as the nature of the collection.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.

original: gang gi phyir de mtha' dag kho na las rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / gzugs 'dzin par so sor ngas pa dang / sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa can zhes bya ba de lta bu so so'i khyad par can gyi rang gi ngo bo de gcig skyed pa de'i phyir de dag ni rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu yin no //üîΩ'di skad du /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de mtha' dag kho na las rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / gzugs 'dzin par so sor ngas pa dang / sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa can zhes bya ba de lta bu so so'i khyad par can gyi rang gi ngo bo de gcig skyed pa de'i phyir de dag ni rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu yin no // 'di skad du /
translated: The nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.

original: 'di ni rtog pa'i ngo bo 'di ni nges pa'i don 'dzin pa'o//
analyzed: 'di ni rtog pa'i ngo bo 'di ni nges pa'i don 'dzin pa'o//
translated: The nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that is produced from all of them.üîΩThe nature of that is the nature of the collection because that

original: @129b 'di ni yul gyi rnam pa can no zhes bya ba'i rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de na ji skad bshad pa'i rgyus byas pa yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: @129b 'di ni yul gyi rnam pa can no zhes bya ba'i rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de na ji skad bshad pa'i rgyus byas pa yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the presentation of the aspect of the object.

original: rnam pa gcig tu na 'di ltar sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gcig tu na 'di ltar sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: In one sense, the syllogism is to be applied in the following way:

original: 'bras bu'i rgyu'i rjes su byed pa nyid yin la ni rag na /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rgyu'i rjes su byed pa nyid yin la ni rag na /
translated: If it is the case that the effect is a transformation of the cause,

original: de ltar skye ba'i de'i rang gi ngo bo gnas pa'i gzhi gang yin /
analyzed: de ltar skye ba'i de'i rang gi ngo bo gnas pa'i gzhi gang yin /
translated: then what is the basis of the endurance of that which arises in that way?

original: 'di ltar 'bras bu'i rten ni ma mthong ngo zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'bras bu'i rten ni ma mthong ngo zhe na /
translated: In that case, the support of the effect is not seen.

original: de'i phyir / rgyu'i nus pa tha dad pa de dag kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / rgyu'i nus pa tha dad pa de dag kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúThose very different potencies of the cause,‚Äù and so on.

original: yan lag gi don ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: yan lag gi don ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The meaning of the parts is the same as before.

original: bsdus pa'i don ni brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: bsdus pa'i don ni brjod par bya ste /
translated: The meaning of the summary should be stated.

original: rgyu'i nus pa khyad par bshad ma thag pa gang dag yin pa de dag kho na tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid gnas pa'i rten yin no zhes bya ba ste rgyu ma gtogs pa rten gzhan med do snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i nus pa khyad par bshad ma thag pa gang dag yin pa de dag kho na tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid gnas pa'i rten yin no zhes bya ba ste rgyu ma gtogs pa rten gzhan med do snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: The nature of the effect that exists in the assembly of only those specific causes that have just been explained is the support. The meaning is that there is no other support besides the cause.

original: lhan cig 'byung ba ma yin pa'i rgyu ji ltar rten yin zhe na /
analyzed: lhan cig 'byung ba ma yin pa'i rgyu ji ltar rten yin zhe na /
translated: How is a non-coexistent cause a support?

original: de'i phyir / 'di ltar de ni de mtha' dag las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / 'di ltar de ni de mtha' dag las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said that ‚Äúit is from the totality of those‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi phyir de mtha' dag kho na las de lta bu de skyes pa de'i phyir rten yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de mtha' dag kho na las de lta bu de skyes pa de'i phyir rten yin no //
translated: Because it is produced from the totality of those, it is a support.

original: 'di skad du skyed par byed pa kho nas rten ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad du skyed par byed pa kho nas rten ces bya'o //
translated: This is saying that it is called a support because it produces.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: It is not otherwise, because that would lead to absurd consequences.

original: gzhan gyi tshig gi go skabs kyi dogs pa bsu bar /
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshig gi go skabs kyi dogs pa bsu bar /
translated: Anticipating an opportunity for others to object,

original: gal te nus pa 'gog pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te nus pa 'gog pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúIf there is no obstruction to the potential,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di dag gi nus pa la 'gog pa med pas na nus pa 'gog pa med pa dag go //
analyzed: 'di dag gi nus pa la 'gog pa med pas na nus pa 'gog pa med pa dag go //
translated: They are called ‚Äúuninterrupted‚Äù because their power is not interrupted.

original: 'gog pa ni gags byed pa dag go //
analyzed: 'gog pa ni gags byed pa dag go //
translated: Interruption is the obstruction of a power.

original: 'di dag gi 'bras bu mjug thogs yin pas 'bras bu mjug thogs pa dag go //
analyzed: 'di dag gi 'bras bu mjug thogs yin pas 'bras bu mjug thogs pa dag go //
translated: They are called ‚Äúconsecutive‚Äù because their effect is consecutive.

original: 'di dag khyad par du bogs dbyung du med pas na khyad par du bogs dbyung du med pa dag ste /
analyzed: 'di dag khyad par du bogs dbyung du med pas na khyad par du bogs dbyung du med pa dag ste /
translated: They are called ‚Äúwithout superior‚Äù because they are not surpassed.

original: bogs dbyung ba zhes bya ba ni dgos pa la bya'o //üîΩ'bras bu bskyed par bya ba la gang dag ni nus pa dgag par yang mi nus la /
analyzed: bogs dbyung ba zhes bya ba ni dgos pa la bya'o // 'bras bu bskyed par bya ba la gang dag ni nus pa dgag par yang mi nus la /
translated: ‚ÄúSuperior‚Äù means ‚Äúbetter.‚Äù

original: bogs 'byin par bya bar yang mi nus pa dang / gang dag gdon mi za bar mjug thogs su 'bras bu bskyed pa'i rkyen de dag la phan tshun lhan cig byed pa'i don ci zhig yin /
analyzed: bogs 'byin par bya bar yang mi nus pa dang / gang dag gdon mi za bar mjug thogs su 'bras bu bskyed pa'i rkyen de dag la phan tshun lhan cig byed pa'i don ci zhig yin /
translated: What is the meaning of mutual simultaneity of those conditions that necessarily generate an effect, whose power is not interrupted and which cannot be surpassed?

original: gang gis na lhan cig byed pa dag ces bya ba skad cig pa nyid ni 'dir khyad par du bogs dbyung du med pa nyid dang / nus pa 'gog pa med pa nyid kyi rgyu yin te /
analyzed: gang gis na lhan cig byed pa dag ces bya ba skad cig pa nyid ni 'dir khyad par du bogs dbyung du med pa nyid dang / nus pa 'gog pa med pa nyid kyi rgyu yin te /
translated: The reason why they are called co-operating causes is that they are momentary, and this momentariness is the cause of their being incapable of being improved upon and of their not obstructing potency.

original: 'di ltar gang dag skad cig ma gcig cig gnas pa de dag ni bogs dbyung bar bya bar yang mi nus la /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang dag skad cig ma gcig cig gnas pa de dag ni bogs dbyung bar bya bar yang mi nus la /
translated: Thus, those that endure for one moment cannot be improved upon.

original: yod pa dgag par yang mi nus so //
analyzed: yod pa dgag par yang mi nus so //
translated: And those that exist cannot be obstructed.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this very reason,

original: @130a * // lhan cig byed pa nyid phan 'dogs pas rab tu phye ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: @130a * // lhan cig byed pa nyid phan 'dogs pas rab tu phye ba ni ma yin no //
translated: co-operating causes are not distinguished by their assistance.

original: phan tshun nus pa 'gog pa sel bas lhan cig byed pa zhig tu 'gyur na yang de bkag pa'i phyir lhan cig byed pa nyid ni de'i rgyu can yang ma yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun nus pa 'gog pa sel bas lhan cig byed pa zhig tu 'gyur na yang de bkag pa'i phyir lhan cig byed pa nyid ni de'i rgyu can yang ma yin no //
translated: Even if they were co-operating causes because they remove the mutual obstruction of potency, co-operation would not be the cause of that removal because it is obstructed.

original: 'dir ni lhan cig byed pa phan tshun phan 'dogs pa dag yin par bsams nas glan ka btsal bar bsam pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni lhan cig byed pa phan tshun phan 'dogs pa dag yin par bsams nas glan ka btsal bar bsam pa yin no //
translated: Here, the opponent thinks that co-operating causes assist each other and then seeks to refute this.

original: 'dir grub pa'i mtha' smra pas /
analyzed: 'dir grub pa'i mtha' smra pas /
translated: Here, the VaibhƒÅ·π£ika says:

original: lhan cig byed pa ni thams cad du bogs 'byin pa bskyed pa 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa ni thams cad du bogs 'byin pa bskyed pa 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúcooperating causes are not necessarily causes that generate enhancement‚Äù and so on.

original: lhan cig byed pa ni thams cad du phan tshun phan 'dogs pa 'ba' zhig la bya ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa ni thams cad du phan tshun phan 'dogs pa 'ba' zhig la bya ba yang ma yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúcooperating causes are not necessarily causes that benefit each other‚Äù and so on.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: mang po dag don ci yang rung gcig byed pa yang lhan cig byed pa nyid du 'dod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: mang po dag don ci yang rung gcig byed pa yang lhan cig byed pa nyid du 'dod pa kho na'o //
translated: Many things are asserted to be cooperating causes when they perform some action together.

original: 'di'i dgongs pa ni 'dus nas byed pa rnams kyang lhan cig byed pa dag ces bya'o snyam pa 'di yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i dgongs pa ni 'dus nas byed pa rnams kyang lhan cig byed pa dag ces bya'o snyam pa 'di yin no //
translated: The intended meaning is that even when they perform an action collectively, they are still cooperating causes.

original: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma thams cad du'o //
analyzed: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma thams cad du'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin every case‚Äù means in every moment.

original: dpe bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dpe bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: To illustrate this point, the root text states:

original: dper na rgyu tshogs tha ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dper na rgyu tshogs tha ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: For example, the final moment of the causal collection.

original: 'di la rgyu'i tshogs tha ma las 'bras bu skye bar don ci byed pa de kho na la mang bo rnams lhan cig byed pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la rgyu'i tshogs tha ma las 'bras bu skye bar don ci byed pa de kho na la mang bo rnams lhan cig byed pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: In this example, many things are not cooperating causes when they perform the same action in the sense of producing an effect.

original: de la 'di snyam du de la lhan cig byed pa nyid ni btags pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: de la 'di snyam du de la lhan cig byed pa nyid ni btags pa yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that the simultaneity of the cause and effect is a designation,

original: de'i phyir 'di nyid dngos su zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di nyid dngos su zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: then to respond to that, he says, ‚ÄúIn fact, it is only that which is the cause of a single effect.‚Äù

original: don gcig byed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de kho na la lhan cig byed pa nyid dngos yin no //
analyzed: don gcig byed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de kho na la lhan cig byed pa nyid dngos yin no //
translated: That which is the cause of a single effect is the actual simultaneity of the cause and effect.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tha ma de nyid rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: tha ma de nyid rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúbecause the final one is the cause.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar rgyu'i tshogs tha ma de kho na mngon sum po gi rgyu yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyu'i tshogs tha ma de kho na mngon sum po gi rgyu yin la /
translated: Thus, the final collection of causes is the cause of the effect that is directly in front of you.

original: rgyu la lhan cig byed pa'i tha snyad 'dogs kyi rgyu ma yin pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu la lhan cig byed pa'i tha snyad 'dogs kyi rgyu ma yin pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: The convention of ‚Äúsimultaneous cause‚Äù is applied to the cause, but not to that which is not a cause.

original: de la 'di snyam du de la 'di yang yol phan tshun phan 'dogs pa nyid kyis kyang mtshan nyid kyang yod par gcig ce na /
analyzed: de la 'di snyam du de la 'di yang yol phan tshun phan 'dogs pa nyid kyis kyang mtshan nyid kyang yod par gcig ce na /
translated: If you think that in that case, the simultaneity of the cause and effect is also a characteristic because of the mutual benefit,

original: de'i phyir / skad cig ma de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / skad cig ma de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: then to respond to that, he says, ‚ÄúIn that moment,‚Äù and so on.

original: skad cig ma tha ma ngo bo nyid gcig pu gang yin pa de la ni 'di la ngo bo nyid kyi cha 'di ni bogs ma dbyung ba yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma tha ma ngo bo nyid gcig pu gang yin pa de la ni 'di la ngo bo nyid kyi cha 'di ni bogs ma dbyung ba yin no //
translated: But in the final moment, which is a single entity, it is not possible to make such a distinction as, ‚ÄúThis part of the entity has not been enhanced,‚Äù

original: 'di ni lhan cig byed pa rnams kyi bogs bskyed pa yin no zhes de lta bu'i dbye ba 'di bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: 'di ni lhan cig byed pa rnams kyi bogs bskyed pa yin no zhes de lta bu'i dbye ba 'di bya bar mi nus so //
translated: ‚ÄúThis is the enhancement of the co-operating factors.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar dbye ba med na khyad par du bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: 'di ltar dbye ba med na khyad par du bya bar mi nus so //
translated: And if there is no distinction, it is not possible to make a difference.

original: ci'i phyir khyad par du bya ba mi nus she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir khyad par du bya ba mi nus she na /
translated: Why is it not possible to make a difference?

original: de'i phyir / khyad par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir / khyad par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni /
translated: Therefore he says, ‚ÄúThe characteristic of the occurrence of a difference is . . .

original: ngo bo nyid gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: . . . another entity.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir khyad par ni ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa de'i phyir dbye ba med @130b na mi srid do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyad par ni ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa de'i phyir dbye ba med @130b na mi srid do //
translated: Because a difference has the characteristic of the occurrence of another entity, therefore, without a distinction, it is impossible.

original: ngo bo nyid gcig pa yin na mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gcig pa yin na mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is impossible if there is a single entity.

original: gal te ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung ba med par khyad par 'byung ba mi srid na /
analyzed: gal te ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung ba med par khyad par 'byung ba mi srid na /
translated: If the occurrence of a difference is impossible without the occurrence of another entity,üîΩthen,

original: 'o na ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung du zad mod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung du zad mod ce na /
translated: But, it may be asked, is it not just a matter of the arising of another intrinsic reality?

original: de'i phyir / ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: To this it is replied: If there were the arising of another intrinsic reality,

original: ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung bar khas len na /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gzhan 'byung bar khas len na /
translated: then, if one accepts the arising of another intrinsic reality,

original: de'i tshe tha ma nyid nyams par 'gyur ro //üîΩnyams su zad mod /
analyzed: de'i tshe tha ma nyid nyams par 'gyur ro // nyams su zad mod /
translated: at that time the finality itself would be undermined.

original: nyes ba ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: nyes ba ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: But, it may be asked, what is the fault if it is undermined?

original: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: To this it is replied: If it were not final,

original: tha ma nyid ma yin nam mngon sum gyi rgyu nyid du khas blangs pa gang yin pa der mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha ma nyid ma yin nam mngon sum gyi rgyu nyid du khas blangs pa gang yin pa der mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then, if it were not final, then that which was accepted as the cause of direct perception would not be so.

original: mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
translated: To conclude, it is said:

original: de lta bas na lhan cig byed pa rnams las rgyu'i khyad par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de lta bas na lhan cig byed pa rnams las rgyu'i khyad par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, from the co-operators, there is no arising of a special cause.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar khyad par ni ngo bo nyid dbye ba med na med pa yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar khyad par ni ngo bo nyid dbye ba med na med pa yin la /
translated: Because in that way, a special cause is not without a difference in intrinsic reality,

original: tha ma la dbye ba med pa de'i phyir lhan cig byed pa rnams la rgyu'i khyad par 'byung ba med do //
analyzed: tha ma la dbye ba med pa de'i phyir lhan cig byed pa rnams la rgyu'i khyad par 'byung ba med do //
translated: and the final one is without difference, therefore from the co-operators there is no arising of a special cause.

original: gal te de la lhan cig byed pa rnams las khyad par 'byung ba med na /
analyzed: gal te de la lhan cig byed pa rnams las khyad par 'byung ba med na /
translated: If they do not arise from the assemblage of causes,

original: 'o na ci'i phyir de dag 'bras bu skyed par nus she na /
analyzed: 'o na ci'i phyir de dag 'bras bu skyed par nus she na /
translated: then why are they able to produce effects?üîΩTherefore, he says, ‚ÄúThose that do not have a prior or subsequent nature, etc.,‚Äù

original: de'i phyir gang dag la sngon dang phyis dang tha dad pa'i ngo bo med pa gang gis mjug thogs su 'bras bu 'byung ba'i rkyen tha ma ngo bo nyid kyi nus pa skad cig gi de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang dag la sngon dang phyis dang tha dad pa'i ngo bo med pa gang gis mjug thogs su 'bras bu 'byung ba'i rkyen tha ma ngo bo nyid kyi nus pa skad cig gi de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The final conditions that have the capacity to produce effects in the next moment are momentary.

original: rkyen tha ma ngo bo nyid kyis nus pa skad cig tsam thogs pa dag lhan cig skye'i /
analyzed: rkyen tha ma ngo bo nyid kyis nus pa skad cig tsam thogs pa dag lhan cig skye'i /
translated: They arise simultaneously with the capacity that is their own nature,

original: skyes zin pa 'di dag la gzhan gyi nus par byed ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skyes zin pa 'di dag la gzhan gyi nus par byed ba ni ma yin no //
translated: but they do not have the capacity to produce other effects.

original: skye ba'i rgyu rnams las nus pa 'byung mod kyi /
analyzed: skye ba'i rgyu rnams las nus pa 'byung mod kyi /
translated: Although the capacity arises from the causes of arising,

original: 'on kyang gzhan gyi lugs la ltos nas ngo bo nyid kyis zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan gyi lugs la ltos nas ngo bo nyid kyis zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: nevertheless, in relation to other systems, he says, ‚Äúby their own nature.‚Äù

original: gzhan gyi rgyu skyes zin pa lhan cig byed pa dag las nus par 'dod do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rgyu skyes zin pa lhan cig byed pa dag las nus par 'dod do //
translated: The capacity is asserted to arise from the assemblage of causes that produce other effects.

original: gang dag la sngon yang med phyis kyang med /
analyzed: gang dag la sngon yang med phyis kyang med /
translated: Those that do not exist prior to or after,

original: tha dad pa'i ngo bo yang med pa gang dag las yud tsam gyi mjug thogs kho nar 'bras bu 'byung gis dus gzhan du ma yin pa skad cig mar gnas pa de lta bu de dag skye ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i ngo bo yang med pa gang dag las yud tsam gyi mjug thogs kho nar 'bras bu 'byung gis dus gzhan du ma yin pa skad cig mar gnas pa de lta bu de dag skye ste /
translated: and do not have a different nature, from which an effect arises only immediately after them, not at another time, and that endure for an instant, those are produced.

original: de lta bu de dag gi lhan cig byed pa nyid don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta bu de dag gi lhan cig byed pa nyid don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
translated: The simultaneity of those is the characteristic of performing the same function.

original: phan tshun 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
translated: It is not the characteristic of mutually designating.

original: gzhan gyi 'dod pa'i 'dogs pa bsu bar /
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'dod pa'i 'dogs pa bsu bar /
translated: To respond to the designation asserted by others,

original: gal te nus pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te nus pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúIf that potency‚Äù and so on.

original: rgyu'i tshogs tha ma re re nus par 'dod pa gang yin pa'i nus pa de nyid gang las byung zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu'i tshogs tha ma re re nus par 'dod pa gang yin pa'i nus pa de nyid gang las byung zhe na /
translated: From what does that potency arise, which is asserted to be the potency of each final collection of causes?

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /üîΩngang gi rgyu dag las so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas / ngang gi rgyu dag las so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The proponent of tenets says:üîΩFrom its own causes.

original: rang gi rgyu gang dag yin pa de dag las rgyu'i khyad par de 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rang gi rgyu gang dag yin pa de dag las rgyu'i khyad par de 'byung ngo //
translated: That potency arises from its own causes, which are specific causes.

original: pha rol po'i tshogs nas byed par @131a * //
analyzed: pha rol po'i tshogs nas byed par @131a * //
translated: The opponent‚Äôs assembly is the cause of the seed‚Äôs special potency.

original: 'gog pa kho na'i dogs pa bsu bar /
analyzed: 'gog pa kho na'i dogs pa bsu bar /
translated: In order to anticipate the qualm that the seed‚Äôs special potency is refuted,

original: gal te de dag gis zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te de dag gis zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
translated: BhƒÅviveka says, ‚ÄúIf those causes . . .‚Äù

original: rgyu de dag gis sa bon la sogs pa re gyu'i khyad par nus pa'i ngo bo 'di chu la sogs pa rkyen gzhan dang nye ba med pa kho nar ci'i phyir mi skyed /
analyzed: rgyu de dag gis sa bon la sogs pa re gyu'i khyad par nus pa'i ngo bo 'di chu la sogs pa rkyen gzhan dang nye ba med pa kho nar ci'i phyir mi skyed /
translated: Why don‚Äôt those causes, such as water, produce the special potency of the seed and so on, which is the nature of a transformation, only when they are not in proximity to other conditions, such as water?

original: ci gzhan du yang nus sam zhe na /
analyzed: ci gzhan du yang nus sam zhe na /
translated: Can they produce it in other cases?

original: res 'ga' gzhan du yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: res 'ga' gzhan du yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: BhƒÅviveka says, ‚ÄúSometimes, even without . . .‚Äù

original: res 'ga' la lang chu la sogs pa lhan cig byed pa med par yang rang gi rgyu dag gis skyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: res 'ga' la lang chu la sogs pa lhan cig byed pa med par yang rang gi rgyu dag gis skyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Sometimes, even without the co-arising of water and so on, the seed and so on are produced by their own causes.

original: de lta yin na ci zhig grub par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de lta yin na ci zhig grub par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is established by that?

original: de'i phyir / la lar gcig pus kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / la lar gcig pus kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, BhƒÅviveka says, ‚ÄúSometimes, even by itself . . .‚Äù

original: gang gis tshe res 'ga' sa bon la sogs pa chu la sogs pa rgyu gzhan dang bral bar rang gi rgyu dag gis skyed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gis tshe res 'ga' sa bon la sogs pa chu la sogs pa rgyu gzhan dang bral bar rang gi rgyu dag gis skyed pa de'i tshe /
translated: When sometimes the seed and so on are produced by their own causes, such as the field, without the other causes, such as water,

original: sa bon la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba gcig gis kyang /
analyzed: sa bon la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba gcig gis kyang /
translated: and from any one of the seed, etc.

original: yul la lar myu gu skyed par 'gyur bas lhan cig byed pa nyid ni don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin par mi btub po zhes bya ba ni phyogs sa ma'i dogs pa yin no //
analyzed: yul la lar myu gu skyed par 'gyur bas lhan cig byed pa nyid ni don gcig byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin par mi btub po zhes bya ba ni phyogs sa ma'i dogs pa yin no //
translated: , a sprout is produced in some place, therefore, the definition of a co-operating cause as that which performs the same action is not tenable.

original: 'dir grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
analyzed: 'dir grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
translated: Here, the proponent of the tenets says:

original: 'du byed rgyud ma gzhan dang gzhan gyi rkyen dang ldan nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'du byed rgyud ma gzhan dang gzhan gyi rkyen dang ldan nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúConditioned by the other and other conditions, etc.‚Äù

original: gzhan dang gzhan gyi rkyen dag ni gzhan dang gzhan gyi rkyen dag ste /
analyzed: gzhan dang gzhan gyi rkyen dag ni gzhan dang gzhan gyi rkyen dag ste /
translated: The other and other conditions are the other and other conditions.

original: de dag dang ldan pa la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de dag dang ldan pa la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which possesses them is so-called.

original: skad cig ni skad cig re re'o //
analyzed: skad cig ni skad cig re re'o //
translated: Moment is each moment.

original: 'di dag la nus pa tha dad pa yod pas na nus pa tha dad pa can dag go //
analyzed: 'di dag la nus pa tha dad pa yod pas na nus pa tha dad pa can dag go //
translated: Since they have different potencies, they are those having different potencies.

original: 'du byed pas na 'du byed dag go //
analyzed: 'du byed pas na 'du byed dag go //
translated: Since they are conditioned, they are conditioned.

original: rgyud ma dag ces bya ba ni rgyun du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud ma dag ces bya ba ni rgyun du gyur pa'o //
translated: The continuum is the stream.

original: 'du byed gang dag rgyun gyi rjes su 'brang zhing gzhan dang gzhan gyi rkyen dang 'brel pas skad cig skad cig la nus pa tha dad pa can gang dag yin pa de dag ni kha dog gam /
analyzed: 'du byed gang dag rgyun gyi rjes su 'brang zhing gzhan dang gzhan gyi rkyen dang 'brel pas skad cig skad cig la nus pa tha dad pa can gang dag yin pa de dag ni kha dog gam /
translated: Those formations that follow a continuum and are related to other and other conditions, which have different potencies in each moment, are recognized as being the same by some color,üîΩby some shape,

original: dbyibs 'ga' zhig gis sam /üîΩrnam pa gzhan gang yang rung ba 'ga' zhig gis 'dra bar shes mod kyi /
analyzed: dbyibs 'ga' zhig gis sam / rnam pa gzhan gang yang rung ba 'ga' zhig gis 'dra bar shes mod kyi /
translated: or by some other aspect.

original: 'on kyang de dag gi la ngo bo nyid tha dad pa kho nar khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang de dag gi la ngo bo nyid tha dad pa kho nar khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: However, one should understand that they are only different in their intrinsic reality.

original: ngo bo nyid tha dad pa yin du chug na yang /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid tha dad pa yin du chug na yang /
translated: Even if they are different in their intrinsic reality,

original: des na ci zhe na /
analyzed: des na ci zhe na /
translated: what then?

original: de'i phyir / des na 'ga' zhig kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / des na 'ga' zhig kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said: ‚ÄúTherefore, it is established that some cause is the cause of some effect.‚Äù

original: rkyen tha dad pas ngo bo nyid tha dad par grub na rgyu 'ga' zhig kho na 'bras bu 'ga' zhig gi rgyu yin no zhes bya bar grub po //
analyzed: rkyen tha dad pas ngo bo nyid tha dad par grub na rgyu 'ga' zhig kho na 'bras bu 'ga' zhig gi rgyu yin no zhes bya bar grub po //
translated: If it is established that they are different in their intrinsic reality due to the difference in their conditions, then it is established that some cause is the cause of some effect.

original: gang gi gang zhig ce na /
analyzed: gang gi gang zhig ce na /
translated: What of what?

original: de'i phyir / de la gzungs dang dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs yul chod pa med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos @131b te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / de la gzungs dang dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs yul chod pa med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos @131b te /
translated: Therefore, it says, ‚ÄúTherein, the collection of dhƒÅra·πáƒ´, faculties, etc., is endowed with the absence of obstruction, etc.‚Äù

original: de la mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs yul rung ba na rnam par gnas shing /
analyzed: de la mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs yul rung ba na rnam par gnas shing /
translated: Therein, the collection of eye, form, etc., is situated in a suitable object.

original: mchod pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa skyed par nus pa'i rgyur 'dod do //
analyzed: mchod pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa skyed par nus pa'i rgyur 'dod do //
translated: That which is worshipped is asserted to be the cause that is able to generate consciousness.

original: mig la sogs pa phan tshun phrad par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi rkyen gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyu skyed par nus pa yin te /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa phan tshun phrad par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi rkyen gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyu skyed par nus pa yin te /
translated: That which is the condition of the sign of mutual contact of eye, etc., is able to generate the cause of consciousness.

original: de ltar na rgyun gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i dngos po rnams la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo bye brag tu rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyun gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i dngos po rnams la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo bye brag tu rig par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the nature of cause and effect should be understood in detail with regard to things that follow a continuum.

original: chod pa ni mi snang ba'o //
analyzed: chod pa ni mi snang ba'o //
translated: Obstruction is non-appearance.

original: de la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni chod pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni chod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: That which has that, etc., is obstruction, etc.

original: sogs pa smos pas ni ha cang ring ba dang nye ba la sogs pa bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas ni ha cang ring ba dang nye ba la sogs pa bsdu'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù includes the sense faculties that are not too far from their objects and not too near to them, and so on.

original: yul gang la de dag med pa yod pa de ni chod ba med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: yul gang la de dag med pa yod pa de ni chod ba med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.

original: gzugs dang dbang po ni gzugs dang dbang po dag go //üîΩde la sogs pa yid la byed pa la sogs pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de ni gzugs dang dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs so //
analyzed: gzugs dang dbang po ni gzugs dang dbang po dag go // de la sogs pa yid la byed pa la sogs pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de ni gzugs dang dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs so //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúform and the sense faculties‚Äù means form and the sense faculties.üîΩThe collection of mental factors and so on that are associated with them is the collection of form, the sense faculties, and so on.üîΩThe sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.üîΩThe sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.

original: gzugs dang dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs gang la yul chod pa med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa yod pa de ni yul chod pa med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa can te /üîΩ'di ni yul chod pa med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa can yang yin la /
analyzed: gzugs dang dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs gang la yul chod pa med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa yod pa de ni yul chod pa med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa can te / 'di ni yul chod pa med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa can yang yin la /
translated: The sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.üîΩThe sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.üîΩThe sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.üîΩThe sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.üîΩThe sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.üîΩThe sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.üîΩThe sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.üîΩThe sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.üîΩThe sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.üîΩThe sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.üîΩThe sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.üîΩThe sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.

original: gzugs dang dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs kyang yin pas gzugs dang dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs yul chod pa med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa can yin no //
analyzed: gzugs dang dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs kyang yin pas gzugs dang dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs yul chod pa med pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa can yin no //
translated: The sense faculties that are not obstructed from their objects and so on are those that are not obstructed from their objects and so on.üîΩThe sense faculties that

original: gcig la gcig nye bar 'gro ba ni phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: gcig la gcig nye bar 'gro ba ni phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba ste /
translated: Mutual approach is the mutual going to each other.

original: nye bar 'gro ba ni 'dir phrad pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar 'gro ba ni 'dir phrad pa'o //
translated: Approach is contact in this context.

original: de la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: That which is like this is mutual approach, etc.

original: sogs pa smos pas ni de la phan 'dogs par byed pa gzhan gang yin pa de yang bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas ni de la phan 'dogs par byed pa gzhan gang yin pa de yang bsdu'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes any other mutual assistance.

original: phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rten rkyen gyi khyad par gang yin pa de ni phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rten rkyen gyi khyad par te rten ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rten rkyen gyi khyad par gang yin pa de ni phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rten rkyen gyi khyad par te rten ni rgyu'o //
translated: The special conditions that are the basis of mutual approach, etc. are the special conditions that are the basis of mutual approach, etc. Basis means cause.

original: rten gyi khyad par zhes bya ba 'di la khyad par zhes bya ba'i sgras ni mngon sum du skyed pa'i rkyen las tha dad par ston par byed do //
analyzed: rten gyi khyad par zhes bya ba 'di la khyad par zhes bya ba'i sgras ni mngon sum du skyed pa'i rkyen las tha dad par ston par byed do //
translated: The word ‚Äúspecial‚Äù in the phrase ‚Äúspecial conditions‚Äù indicates that they are different from the conditions that directly produce the effect.

original: 'di dag gi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid 'di bye brag tu yin du chug na yang /
analyzed: 'di dag gi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid 'di bye brag tu yin du chug na yang /
translated: Although the nature of cause and effect is distinct in this way,

original: tshogs nas byed pa go ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
analyzed: tshogs nas byed pa go ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
translated: why is it that the collection of causes is not the only cause of the effect?

original: de dag kyang sngon yang med ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩrnam par shes pa'i rgyu gang dag yin pa dang / nus pa'i rgyu gang dag yin pa de dag ni mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu'i gnas skabs na sngon rol na yang med la dus @132a * //
analyzed: de dag kyang sngon yang med ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te / rnam par shes pa'i rgyu gang dag yin pa dang / nus pa'i rgyu gang dag yin pa de dag ni mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu'i gnas skabs na sngon rol na yang med la dus @132a * //
translated: Moreover, they are not previously existent, etc.

original: dus su phyis kyang med tha dad pa'i ngo bo yang med do //
analyzed: dus su phyis kyang med tha dad pa'i ngo bo yang med do //
translated: Those that are causes of consciousness and those that are causes of potential do not exist prior to the occasion of the cause that is asserted, nor do they exist later at the time of the effect, nor do they exist as a different entity.üîΩTherefore, even if they are capable, why are they not previously existent, not later existent, and not a different entity?

original: de'i phyir nus kyang ci ste sngon med cing phyis med la tha dad pa'i ngo bo ma yin zhes bya ba de lta bu'i nyes pa smras pa gang dag yin pa sngon dang phyis dang tha dad pa'i ngo bo nyes pa de dag gi de la mi gos
analyzed: de'i phyir nus kyang ci ste sngon med cing phyis med la tha dad pa'i ngo bo ma yin zhes bya ba de lta bu'i nyes pa smras pa gang dag yin pa sngon dang phyis dang tha dad pa'i ngo bo nyes pa de dag gi de la mi gos
translated: The faults that are stated in this way, such as being previously existent, later existent, and a different entity, do not apply to this system.

original: / mi 'bag mi reg ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: / mi 'bag mi reg ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúdo not apply‚Äù is that they do not touch, do not stain, and do not affect.

original: mjug bsdus nas nyes pa 'jug pa yongs su spangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mjug bsdus nas nyes pa 'jug pa yongs su spangs pa'i phyir /
translated: In summary, in order to completely abandon the entry of faults,

original: des na 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: des na 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúTherefore, these,‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi phyir 'di dag sngon yang med //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di dag sngon yang med //
translated: Because these are not previously existent,

original: phyis kyang med tha dad pa'i ngo bo yang ma yin pa'i rgyu des na rgyu 'di dag phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa bskyed par nus pa'i rgyu'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: phyis kyang med tha dad pa'i ngo bo yang ma yin pa'i rgyu des na rgyu 'di dag phan tshun nye bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa bskyed par nus pa'i rgyu'i rgyu yin la /
translated: Nor is it the case that they are not different from each other. Therefore, the cause of the mutual approach of these causes is the cause of the cause that is able to generate consciousness.

original: de yang skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir nam yang gzhan du 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: de yang skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir nam yang gzhan du 'gyur ba med do //
translated: And that is momentary, so it never becomes anything else.

original: ci'i phyir / res 'ga' gzhan du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir / res 'ga' gzhan du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Why? Sometimes it becomes something else.

original: de'i phyir / la lar gcig pus kyang bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes gang smras pa de gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir / la lar gcig pus kyang bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes gang smras pa de gsal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is clear that what you said, namely, that sometimes a single cause generates, is not correct.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo'i kha na mtho ba med pa 'di lta bu 'di gzhan la yang bsgre ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo'i kha na mtho ba med pa 'di lta bu 'di gzhan la yang bsgre ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to extend this same irreproachability of the nature of cause and effect to other cases as well, he says,

original: tshul 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: tshul 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúBy this method . . . ‚Äù

original: 'dir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo la so sor nges pa bshad pa'i tshul gang yin pa 'di ni gzhan thams cad la yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo la so sor nges pa bshad pa'i tshul gang yin pa 'di ni gzhan thams cad la yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: The method of explaining the determination of the nature of cause and effect should be applied to all other cases.

original: gzhan gang la zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gang la zhe na /
translated: What else?

original: dngos po nus pa skad cig ma re re la ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dngos po nus pa skad cig ma re re la ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The entities that are the different natures of the different potencies in each moment, etc.

original: so sor nges pa 'di ni nus pa gang dag skad cig ma re re la ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan gyi rjes su 'gro ba de de la blta bar bya'i dngos po gang dag bstan pa gcig pu'i ngo bo nyid can la ni ma
analyzed: so sor nges pa 'di ni nus pa gang dag skad cig ma re re la ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan gyi rjes su 'gro ba de de la blta bar bya'i dngos po gang dag bstan pa gcig pu'i ngo bo nyid can la ni ma
translated: This is ascertained individually. It is seen in those that are the different natures of the different potencies in each moment, but not in those entities that have the nature of a single manifestation.

original: yin no // gang dag la ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gi rjes su 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can yod pa de dag ni nus pa ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gi rjes su 'gro ba can dag ste /
analyzed: yin no // gang dag la ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gi rjes su 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can yod pa de dag ni nus pa ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gi rjes su 'gro ba can dag ste /
translated: Those that have the nature of following the different natures are those that have the nature of following the different potencies.

original: dngos po tha dad pas tha dad pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dngos po tha dad pas tha dad pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Those that are different due to the difference of entities are those that have such a nature. This is the meaning of the term.

original: gang dag la bstan pa gcig pu'i ngo bo nyid yod pa de dag ni brtan pa gcig pu'i ngo bo nyid can dag go //
analyzed: gang dag la bstan pa gcig pu'i ngo bo nyid yod pa de dag ni brtan pa gcig pu'i ngo bo nyid can dag go //
translated: Those that have the nature of a single manifestation are those that have the nature of a single enduring reality.

original: yang ci'i phyir brtan pa gcig pu'i ngo bo nyid can dag la ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir brtan pa gcig pu'i ngo bo nyid can dag la ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not the case that those that have the nature of a single enduring reality are the ones that are manifested?

original: ngo bo nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba med pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba med pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúbecause there is no transformation of an essential nature, etc.‚Äù

original: dngos por nams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzhan du 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: dngos por nams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzhan du 'gyur ba med do //
translated: The essential nature of an entity never changes.

original: de'i phyir gal te dngos po bstan pa'i 'bras bu skyed nus pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig yin na des na 'di byed par mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te dngos po bstan pa'i 'bras bu skyed nus pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig yin na des na 'di byed par mi 'thad de /
translated: Therefore, if an entity has the nature of being able to produce the effect of a manifestation, then it is not tenable that it can be manifested,

original: thams cad du byed pa kho nar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa @132b yin no //
analyzed: thams cad du byed pa kho nar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa @132b yin no //
translated: because it would have to be manifested at all times.

original: 'on te mi nus pa'i ngo bo nyid pa cig yin na ni de'i tshe yang med par mi 'thad de /
analyzed: 'on te mi nus pa'i ngo bo nyid pa cig yin na ni de'i tshe yang med par mi 'thad de /
translated: But if it has the nature of being unable to produce the effect of a manifestation, then it is not tenable that it can be manifested,

original: thams cad du mi byed pa kho nar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad du mi byed pa kho nar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
translated: because it would not be manifested at all.

original: res 'ga' byed res 'ga' zhig mi byed ces bya ba gang yin pa de lta bur ni ma 'gyur ro //
analyzed: res 'ga' byed res 'ga' zhig mi byed ces bya ba gang yin pa de lta bur ni ma 'gyur ro //
translated: But it is not like that, since sometimes it does and sometimes it does not perform its function.

original: de dag ni nus pa dang mi nus pa yang yin la ngo bo nyid kyang yin pas zhes bsdu'o //
analyzed: de dag ni nus pa dang mi nus pa yang yin la ngo bo nyid kyang yin pas zhes bsdu'o //
translated: They are both capable and incapable, and they are also by nature, so it is summarized.

original: byed pa dang mi byed pa ni byed pa dang mi byed pa dag ste /
analyzed: byed pa dang mi byed pa ni byed pa dang mi byed pa dag ste /
translated: The performance and non-performance of its function are the performance and non-performance of its function.

original: de dag mi rung ba la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de dag mi rung ba la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That is said to be impossible.

original: gzhan gyi tshig gi go skabs kyi dogs pa bsu bar /
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshig gi go skabs kyi dogs pa bsu bar /
translated: Anticipating the opportunity for others‚Äô words,

original: gal te lhan cig byed kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te lhan cig byed kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúIf it is a co-operator, etc.‚Äù

original: 'dis nus kyang lhan cig byed pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig byed kyi /
analyzed: 'dis nus kyang lhan cig byed pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig byed kyi /
translated: Even though it is capable, it is a co-operator with other co-operators,

original: 'ga' zhig gis ni ma yin no//
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis ni ma yin no//
translated: but not with some other.

original: de'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i nyes par thal bar med do zhes bya ba ni phyogs snga ma'i dogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i nyes par thal bar med do zhes bya ba ni phyogs snga ma'i dogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the consequence of the fault explained does not apply, is the doubt of the opponent.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smras bas /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smras bas /
translated: The proponent of tenets says,

original: ci 'ba' zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ci 'ba' zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúIs it only, etc.‚Äù

original: kye 'ba' zhig gi 'bras bu bskyed par nus pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin nam ci na gang gis na lhan cig byed pa la ltos /
analyzed: kye 'ba' zhig gi 'bras bu bskyed par nus pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin nam ci na gang gis na lhan cig byed pa la ltos /
translated: But if it is not, then why does it depend on the assemblage of causes and conditions?

original: pha rol pos nus so zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: pha rol pos nus so zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: The opponent says that it is able to produce the effect.

original: brten pa'i dngos po 'di 'ba' zhig gis nus pa kho na'o //
analyzed: brten pa'i dngos po 'di 'ba' zhig gis nus pa kho na'o //
translated: The response is that this thing that depends on others is only able to produce the effect.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
translated: The proponent of tenets says:

original: ci'i phyir mi bskyed ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi bskyed ces bya ba smos te /
translated: Why doesn‚Äôt it produce the effect?

original: 'ba' zhig gis kyang nus na go ci'i phyir mi bskyed /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig gis kyang nus na go ci'i phyir mi bskyed /
translated: If it is able to produce the effect, why doesn‚Äôt it produce it?

original: de la 'di snyam du 'ba' zhig gis ni bsad kyang mi bskyed do snyam du sems na /
analyzed: de la 'di snyam du 'ba' zhig gis ni bsad kyang mi bskyed do snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that even though it is able to produce the effect, it does not produce it,

original: de'i phyir / mi bskyed na ji ltar nus zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / mi bskyed na ji ltar nus zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: then the response is: If it does not produce the effect, how is it able to?

original: gang zhig nam yang 'ba' zhig gis mi bskyed pa de ji ltar nus pa'i srid par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang zhig nam yang 'ba' zhig gis mi bskyed pa de ji ltar nus pa'i srid par 'gyur /
translated: How could that which never produces the effect by itself be said to be able to produce the effect?

original: gzhan gyi lugs kyi dogs pa bsu bar /
analyzed: gzhan gyi lugs kyi dogs pa bsu bar /
translated: Anticipating an objection from the opponent‚Äôs perspective,

original: gal te thag pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te thag pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: the treatise states, ‚ÄúIf you say that a rope, for example, is not able to produce a cloth, but is able to produce a pot, this is not the case.‚Äù

original: nus pa gang yin pa des ni gdon mi za bar bskyed dgos so zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'di ni med do //
analyzed: nus pa gang yin pa des ni gdon mi za bar bskyed dgos so zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'di ni med do //
translated: But there is no certainty that what is capable must necessarily produce.

original: 'di ltar thag pa la sogs pa ras yug la sogs par byed nus mod kyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar thag pa la sogs pa ras yug la sogs par byed nus mod kyi /
translated: For example, a rope, etc., is capable of being made into a cloth, etc.,

original: thams cad du byed pa ni ma yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: thams cad du byed pa ni ma yin pa nyid de /
translated: but it is not made into everything that it is capable of being made into.

original: 'dir yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni phyogs snga ma'i dogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni phyogs snga ma'i dogs pa yin no //
translated: The same would be true here.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas /
translated: The VaibhƒÅ·π£ika says:

original: thos tshams pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thos tshams pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the possibility of hearing.

original: rtse ba'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: rtse ba'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: The author of the treatise says, ‚ÄúThey are of the nature of playfulness, etc.‚Äù

original: lha rnams dga' ba ni drang po'am blun po yin te /
analyzed: lha rnams dga' ba ni drang po'am blun po yin te /
translated: The gods are straightforward or foolish,

original: de ni skyid de bar bskyed bskyed pas dga' ba'i rang bzhin can yin no //
analyzed: de ni skyid de bar bskyed bskyed pas dga' ba'i rang bzhin can yin no //
translated: because they are born from the nature of joy.

original: rtse ba ni byis pa'i chos de de dang 'dra bas ni shes rab med pa nyid du ston par byed do //
analyzed: rtse ba ni byis pa'i chos de de dang 'dra bas ni shes rab med pa nyid du ston par byed do //
translated: Playfulness is a childish quality. The author shows that they are devoid of wisdom.

original: skyed de bar bskyed bskyed pa nyid kyis ni bstan bcos dag la mngon par brtson pa med par ston par byed do //
analyzed: skyed de bar bskyed bskyed pa nyid kyis ni bstan bcos dag la mngon par brtson pa med par ston par byed do //
translated: and by the very fact that he is being made to generate it, he shows that he is not devoted to the treatises.

original: gang zhig brtson @133a * //
analyzed: gang zhig brtson @133a * //
translated: He who is not devoted

original: pa med cing blo ngan pa de med ngos po byas kyang brjed ngas pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: pa med cing blo ngan pa de med ngos po byas kyang brjed ngas pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir /
translated: and who is of poor intellect, even though he has made a composition, because he is forgetful by nature,

original: yang dang yang byed du 'jug go //
analyzed: yang dang yang byed du 'jug go //
translated: he is made to compose again and again.

original: byas zhes bya ba ni lan btab zin to //
analyzed: byas zhes bya ba ni lan btab zin to //
translated: The word ‚Äúmade‚Äù has already been explained.

original: yang dang yang byed du 'jug ces bya ba ni yang dang yang lan 'debs su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: yang dang yang byed du 'jug ces bya ba ni yang dang yang lan 'debs su 'jug pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúMade to compose again and again‚Äù means made to reply again and again.

original: 'di gang du lan btab zin ce na /
analyzed: 'di gang du lan btab zin ce na /
translated: Where has this already been explained?

original: de'i phyir / 'di ltar 'dis ni sa bon la sogs par nye bar dgod par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / 'di ltar 'dis ni sa bon la sogs par nye bar dgod par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore he says, ‚ÄúFor this reason, he is made to adduce such things as the seed,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di ni gal te sa bon la sogs pa bzhin du ma nges pa yin no snyam ste zhes bya ba'i skabs der dpyang zin to //
analyzed: 'di ni gal te sa bon la sogs pa bzhin du ma nges pa yin no snyam ste zhes bya ba'i skabs der dpyang zin to //
translated: This is the context of the question, ‚ÄúIf it is uncertain like a seed and so on?‚Äù

original: mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to conclude, he says,

original: de lta bas na ngo bo nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de lta bas na ngo bo nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so on.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar bshad pa'i rnam pas nus pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mi bskyed par mi rung ngo zhes bshad pa de'i phyir ngo bo nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba med par 'bras bu skyed pa'i chos kyi dngos po gang yin pa de ni tha ma'i gnas
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar bshad pa'i rnam pas nus pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mi bskyed par mi rung ngo zhes bshad pa de'i phyir ngo bo nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba med par 'bras bu skyed pa'i chos kyi dngos po gang yin pa de ni tha ma'i gnas
translated: Because it is not tenable to generate an entity that lacks the nature of being able to perform a function in the way that has been explained, therefore, any phenomenon that is an entity that generates an effect whose nature does not transform is like the final moment.

original: skabs bzhin du sngon yang 'bras bu bskyed pa bzlog tu mi rung ngo //
analyzed: skabs bzhin du sngon yang 'bras bu bskyed pa bzlog tu mi rung ngo //
translated: It is untenable that it generates an effect earlier.

original: de la 'di snyam du 'di sngon ni nus pa med pa kho na yin la /
analyzed: de la 'di snyam du 'di sngon ni nus pa med pa kho na yin la /
translated: If you think that earlier it was only not able to perform a function,

original: 'di'i nus pa ni tha ma'i gnas skabs su 'byung ngo snyam du sems na /
analyzed: 'di'i nus pa ni tha ma'i gnas skabs su 'byung ngo snyam du sems na /
translated: and its ability arises in the final moment,üîΩthen NƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains: Because its nature does not transform

original: de'i phyir tha ma'i gnas skabs na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir tha ma'i gnas skabs na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so on.

original: gang gi tshe sngon nus pa med pa las tha ma'i gnas skabs su nus pa 'byung ngo zhes bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe yang ci nus pa de dngos po'i bdag nyid du gyur pa zhig yin nam /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sngon nus pa med pa las tha ma'i gnas skabs su nus pa 'byung ngo zhes bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe yang ci nus pa de dngos po'i bdag nyid du gyur pa zhig yin nam /
translated: When you assert that potency arises in the final state from what was previously without potency, then at that time, is that potency an entity that has come into being?

original: 'on te gzhan du gyur pa zhig yin zhes bya ba brtag pa gnyis so //
analyzed: 'on te gzhan du gyur pa zhig yin zhes bya ba brtag pa gnyis so //
translated: Or is it an entity that has not come into being?

original: gal te bdag nyid du gyur pa zhig yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te bdag nyid du gyur pa zhig yin na ni /
translated: If it is an entity that has come into being,

original: de'i tshe nus pa dngos po'i ngo bo nyid tha ma'i gnas skabs su 'byung bar khas len na /
analyzed: de'i tshe nus pa dngos po'i ngo bo nyid tha ma'i gnas skabs su 'byung bar khas len na /
translated: then at that time, if you accept that potency arises in the final state as the nature of an entity,

original: sngon med pa'i dngos po zhig skye ba kho nar khas blangs pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon med pa'i dngos po zhig skye ba kho nar khas blangs pa yin no //
translated: then you are accepting that a previously nonexistent entity arises.

original: 'on te nus pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin na ni de'i tshe de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin na dngos po de byed pa po ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te nus pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin na ni de'i tshe de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin na dngos po de byed pa po ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if potency is not the nature of an entity, then at that time, if it is not the nature of an entity, that entity would not be a creator.

original: ci'i phyir zhen /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhen /
translated: Why is that?

original: nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIf potency is the nature of an entity,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di ltar rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dngos po gzhan zhig las 'bras bu 'byung ba zhes bya bar shes kyi dngos po las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dngos po gzhan zhig las 'bras bu 'byung ba zhes bya bar shes kyi dngos po las ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, it is known that an effect arises from a thing called ‚Äúpotential,‚Äù which is a different entity from the thing, by the process of agreement and difference.

original: de ltar nus pa tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin par rnam par brtag pa bsal nas /
analyzed: de ltar nus pa tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin par rnam par brtag pa bsal nas /
translated: Having thus refuted the examination of potential as different or non-different,

original: gtan tshigs gzhan bstan pa'i phyir gzhan yang re zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan bstan pa'i phyir gzhan yang re zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: in order to teach another reason, he says, ‚ÄúMoreover, if a thing is stable by nature, why does it not always perform its function?‚ÄùüîΩIf a thing is stable by nature, why does it not always perform its function?

original: re zhig dngos po brtan pa'i rang bzhin can gang yin pa de gang gi @133b tshe tha ma'i gnas skabs na lhan cig byed pa mtha' dag dang ldan pa de'i tshe nyid na ci'i phyir 'bras bu bskyed /
analyzed: re zhig dngos po brtan pa'i rang bzhin can gang yin pa de gang gi @133b tshe tha ma'i gnas skabs na lhan cig byed pa mtha' dag dang ldan pa de'i tshe nyid na ci'i phyir 'bras bu bskyed /
translated: When it is endowed with all the conditions, at that time itself, why does it not generate the effect?

original: 'di la lhan cig byed pa mtha' dag yod pas 'di ni lhan cig byed pa mtha' dag dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la lhan cig byed pa mtha' dag yod pas 'di ni lhan cig byed pa mtha' dag dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Here, since all the conditions are present, it is endowed with all the conditions.

original: pha rol bos bskyed pa mthong ba ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: pha rol bos bskyed pa mthong ba ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The opponent says, ‚ÄúWe see that it generates the effect after the conditions are assembled.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir 'bras bu bskyed pa mthong pa de'i phyir skyed do zhes smra'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'bras bu bskyed pa mthong pa de'i phyir skyed do zhes smra'o //
translated: Because we see that it generates an effect, therefore we say that it generates it.

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas co 'dri ba'i phyir /üîΩmthu chen po can gyi mthong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas co 'dri ba'i phyir / mthu chen po can gyi mthong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The advocate of tenets says this in order to ridicule us.üîΩThe response to that is, ‚ÄúThe seeing of one with great power . . . ‚Äù and so on.

original: mthu chen po can gyi khyod kyis mthong ba gang yin pa de ni nus pa chen po can yin no //
analyzed: mthu chen po can gyi khyod kyis mthong ba gang yin pa de ni nus pa chen po can yin no //
translated: The seeing of one with great power is powerful.

original: ci'i phyir mthong ba 'di ni nus pa chen po can yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mthong ba 'di ni nus pa chen po can yin zhe na /
translated: Why is this seeing powerful?

original: 'di ltar mthong ba 'di ni dngos po 'bras bu bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba dag kyang rang gi ngo bo tsam gyi bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams la sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar mthong ba 'di ni dngos po 'bras bu bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba dag kyang rang gi ngo bo tsam gyi bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams la sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because this seeing is applied to various actions that are merely the intrinsic state of things that are devoid of the nature of generating an effect.

original: 'dir kho bo la gnod pa ni ci yang med mod kyi /
analyzed: 'dir kho bo la gnod pa ni ci yang med mod kyi /
translated: Here, we have no fault at all.

original: 'on kyang rgyu zhig la rgyu 'ga' zhig ltar khyod ched du ma btang pa'am yengs pa'i mthong ba'i lam las 'das par gyur na /
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu zhig la rgyu 'ga' zhig ltar khyod ched du ma btang pa'am yengs pa'i mthong ba'i lam las 'das par gyur na /
translated: However, if you, like a cause, are not deliberately applied to a cause or if you are distracted, you will go beyond the path of seeing.

original: kye ma de'i tshe rgyu de skyed par mi byed pa'i chos can yin te /
analyzed: kye ma de'i tshe rgyu de skyed par mi byed pa'i chos can yin te /
translated: Alas, at that time, the cause would not be a producer, because it would be a cause that is interrupted.

original: rgyud rnam par 'chad pa can du 'gyur pas bsam pa 'di ni kho bo'i sems la nyam nga'o //
analyzed: rgyud rnam par 'chad pa can du 'gyur pas bsam pa 'di ni kho bo'i sems la nyam nga'o //
translated: Therefore, this idea is not acceptable to me.

original: 'di la nus pa chen po yod pas 'di la mthu chen po yod pa zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di la nus pa chen po yod pas 'di la mthu chen po yod pa zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: Since it has great power, it is called a great power.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa dag ces bya ba ni bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa dag ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa dag ces bya ba ni bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa dag ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthat are not of its nature‚Äù means that are not of the nature of a producer.

original: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni srid pa ste /
analyzed: kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni srid pa ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù means ‚Äúeven.‚Äù

original: de lta bu dag kyang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de lta bu dag kyang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthat are like that‚Äù means ‚Äúeven those that are like that.‚Äù

original: rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis zhes bya ba na mthong ba tsam gyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis zhes bya ba na mthong ba tsam gyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúby their mere nature‚Äù means ‚Äúby their mere appearance.‚Äù

original: kye ma zhes bya ba ni ba mi brtse ba'o //üîΩbskyed pa ni rab tu bskyed pa'o//
analyzed: kye ma zhes bya ba ni ba mi brtse ba'o // bskyed pa ni rab tu bskyed pa'o//
translated: The word ‚Äúalas‚Äù expresses pity.üîΩ‚ÄúProduction‚Äù means ‚Äúgeneration.‚Äù

original: tshad de 'di la yod pas 'di ni skyed pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: tshad de 'di la yod pas 'di ni skyed pa'i chos can no //
translated: Since it has that measure, it is a producer.

original: skyed pa'i chos can ma yin pa ni ma skyed pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: skyed pa'i chos can ma yin pa ni ma skyed pa'i chos can no //
translated: The non-producer is the non-producer of an effect.

original: 'di la rgyu med pa yod pas 'di ni rgyu med pa can no //
analyzed: 'di la rgyu med pa yod pas 'di ni rgyu med pa can no //
translated: Since there is no cause here, this is causeless.

original: gdung ba ni chags pa dang nyam nga zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gdung ba ni chags pa dang nyam nga zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Torment is a synonym for attachment and distress.

original: pha rol po kho bo ni de'i ngo bo ma yin pa las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: pha rol po kho bo ni de'i ngo bo ma yin pa las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The opponent says, ‚ÄúWe see that which is not of the nature of a producer, etc.‚Äù

original: kho bo ni 'bras bu skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa dag bdag gis mthong bas 'bras bu bskyed do zhes ni mi smra'o //
analyzed: kho bo ni 'bras bu skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa dag bdag gis mthong bas 'bras bu bskyed do zhes ni mi smra'o //
translated: We do not say that which is not of the nature of a producer of an effect produces an effect, because we see that which is not of the nature of a producer of an effect.

original: 'on kyang de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyi 'bras bu skyed pa'i chos can yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyi 'bras bu skyed pa'i chos can yin la /
translated: However, those are of the nature of producers of an effect.

original: de lta bu de dag bdag gis mthong na /
analyzed: de lta bu de dag bdag gis mthong na /
translated: When we see such things,

original: 'di dag ni skyed pa po yin no zhes bya bas shes par zad do //
analyzed: 'di dag ni skyed pa po yin no zhes bya bas shes par zad do //
translated: we know that they are producers.

original: de skyed pa ni de bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de skyed pa ni de bskyed pa'o //
translated: The production of that is the production of an effect.

original: chos de gang dag la yod pa @134a * //
analyzed: chos de gang dag la yod pa @134a * //
translated: Those things that have that

original: de dag ni skyed pa'i chos can dag ste /
analyzed: de dag ni skyed pa'i chos can dag ste /
translated: are of the nature of producers.

original: de zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'bras bu dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'bras bu dang sbyar ro //
